original: apply Build_SeparationAlgebra with (fun m1 m2 m => J (option worlds) (option_join J m1 m2 m)). - intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2. destruct (join m1 m2 m) as [J1 | J2]. + exists J2. split. * apply (option_join J). apply J2. * apply H2. + exists J2. split. * apply H1. * apply (option_join J). apply J2.
